title: Build Health + Bundle Size Regression Check
verdict: PASS - Build succeeds with 0 errors, 0 warnings. Bundle baseline established: dist/ = 32MB, index.js = 6.8MB.

bundle_baseline.note: Single-file bundle via tsc output. Large due to 191 engine files + 45 dispatchers + 80+ cadence functions compiled together.

regression_recommendation: Add CI step to track dist/index.js size and alert on >10% growth between commits
